aboutPage.title: About FajrulIlm
aboutPage.missionText: FajrulIlm (Dawn of Knowledge) is dedicated to providing a reliable and accessible platform for individuals to seek authentic Islamic knowledge directly from verified Ulama (scholars). We aim to foster a community of learning, understanding, and spiritual growth, making traditional Islamic teachings available in a modern, digital format.
